body.name: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for Most 37-75 inch TVs up to 100 lbs, Wall Mount Bracket with Dual Articulating Arms, Swivel, Tilt, Max VESA 600x400mm, TV Mount Fits 12”/16” Wood Studs, PILF6
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 3 mins
features: DESIGNED FOR 37”-75” TVs: The Pipishell articulating TV mount fits most 37”-75” flat and curved TVs up to 100 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase.

SMOOTH MOVEMENT: The full motion TV bracket features an enhanced arm hinge to provide smoother movement for effortless extension up to 14.37”. Bring your TV closer for viewing or retract back to 3.23” from the wall for a low-profile look.

FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT: The flexible TV wall mount features +5°/-15° tilt to reduce glare, +/-45° swivel to direct the screen toward you, and easy +/-3° leveling after installation to fine tune your screen’s position.

ULTRA-STRONG TV BRACKET: Made from sturdy cold-rolled steel, the solid TV bracket with dual articulating arms ensure maximum strength and stability. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your TV is stable and secure on this wall mount TV bracket.

EASY INSTALLATION: Instructions and mounting hardware are included along with mounting template and bubble level to make installation a breeze. The TV mount can be installed on 12”/16” wood studs, concrete, and brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount | Ultimate Viewing Comfort If you are looking to upgrade your entertainment setup, the PILF6 full motion TV wall mount is the perfect choice. Free up space in your living area by moving your television off furniture to give your home a more streamlined aesthetic that reduces clutter.

This flexible wall mount can extend, swivel, and tilt to provide the best positioning of your TV for an improved viewing experience. Enjoy the very best that your screen can offer while you watch your favorite movies or games with your family in comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, nice mount
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to install, holds the tv as intended. Swivel works as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: This was a little different on putting together but seemed really sturdy. Nicer but not as quick to install as the cheaper onn I've purchased at Walmart. It does seem to be better built that onn. I installed this for my mom's 75 inch so no picture to add.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and great range of motion
reviews.reviewText: It fit out TV perfectly and was easy to install. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Mount for Most TVs
reviews.reviewText: First, the pros: - Sturdy - Holds heavy TVs - Good range of motion - Relatively cheap - Lots of mounting options (studs, brick, etc) - Good installation instructionsThe cons: - The "tilt" bolts don't seem to be able hold my 83lb Samsung 54 inch TV in the fully vertical position. No matter how hard I tighten them, the TV slips back into a slight downward angle. Not a deal-breaker, but definitely annoying. Be aware of this if you want/need a heavier TV to be perfectly vertical (parallel to mounting wall) - No wiring harness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect to get our tv on the wall and give us back the top of our fireplace. It was easy to install and is very sturdy. Only drawback was not having more anchors and 6 bolts instead of only 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy it again
reviews.reviewText: Product was how described. Installation was a little tricky using spacers to adjust fitment from frame to back of tv but once we figured that out it was pretty self explanatory to mount onto wall. Good price point and product is sturdy!

reviews.reviewText: Yesterday i fix two of my tv one 65 inch and other 45 inch .. looks good quality is nice.. go for it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount was really easy to put together. Easy to mount with the template included. Fit my TV perfect. Lag bolts included were strong. Mount moves in several positions and can be set up to allow viewing at almost every angle. Recommend
Lots of hardware to match a variety of televisions. Clear directions. Sturdy and works well.

Love this TV wall mount. Good instructions, easy to follow. Sturdy structure, smooth mechanism to maneuver TV. Lots of bolts and fittings to install to rear of TV.I am really happy with this product. Highly recommended!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: It is sweet that they came with simple install board, small level and nylon tie wraps
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this TV wall mount for my 55” TV. When I open the coming box my first feeling is unreliability. It isn’t strong as I thought with the description and pictures online. But the Dual Articulating Arms, Swivel, Tilt works well. The quality looks good. Anyway I am a conservative. My TV size 55” is in the middle of this TV mount’s range 37”-75”, so it should be fine. I installed it. It works well. It is sweet that they came with simple install board, small level and nylon tie wraps. Those made my installing conveniently.

I recently purchased a TV mount for my old house, which has some unusual wall stud spacing. To solve this issue, I decided to attach 1.5 inch plywood to the studs on the outside of the wall instead of using internal bracing. The TV mount was then securely screwed into the plywood. I was pleasantly surprised to find that my old 52 inch Sharp Aquas, weighing over 60 pounds, was easily supported by this setup. Additionally, I was impressed by the wide range of bolts provided, ensuring a perfect fit for various TV models. Overall, this purchase turned out to be just what I needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid mount. Easy to install. Every hole accounted for!
reviews.reviewText: I have an older model Sharp Aquos 46" TV that weighs 42 lbs (without stand) and 51" (with stand). It's heavy (unlike the newer TV models). I wanted to make sure that the mount is rated for double the weight.PROS:* feels "solid" and sturdy* all the screws were packaged neatly in its own "divider" and labelled cleary (No need to sort through a giant bag filled with unknown screws)* instructions were easy to follow* video link to help with best height calculations was useful (link was in the instruction manual)* easy to make the minor adjustments at the end (tilt, level, etc).* swings out/in easilyCONS* I really couldn't find any consA few helpful notes - (1) I saw an older review/video about "missing holes". Looks like they may have reversed one of the pieces so the holes didn't align properly. For me, everything fit perfectly, all the holes were where they were supposed to be. (2) One person could install the mount, but it is helpful to have two people for certain steps. (3) Measure stud locations (from both sides), measure again, might help to use something like green tape to measure out where the TV should go, and pencil markings are your friends. Stare at the wall for a while to make sure you are happy with the height and placement. Measure again....THEN drill into the stud. You know that old adage "measure twice, cut/drill once", lol.Overall, very happy with the quality of the wall mount.
